description: Search projects for reference sheets, documentation files, and other context-rich files useful for AI agents

orchestrator_instructions.role: Aggregate all project-specific indexes into a master context catalog

steps.step_1: READ all 3 agent output files (coderef-system-index.md, coderef-dashboard-index.md, coderef-core-index.md)
steps.step_2: COMBINE all file lists into a single master-context-index.md organized by project
steps.step_3: ADD summary statistics (total files per project, total across all projects)

agent_instructions.role: Search assigned project directory for context-useful files and create file index

steps.step_1: SEARCH your project directory (in communication.json agents[].agent_path) for these file types: *.md, *.txt, *-schema.json, *-template.*, CLAUDE.md, README.md, ARCHITECTURE.md, API.md, resource-sheet-*.md, reference-*.md, docs/*, .coderef/*, coderef/*, guide-*.md
steps.step_2: CREATE simple list in your output file (no descriptions, just file paths relative to project root)
steps.step_3: ORGANIZE by category: Documentation, Schemas, Templates, Reference Sheets, Other
steps.step_4: UPDATE your status in communication.json to 'complete'

output_template:
# {Project Name} - Context File Index

**Project Path:** {path}
**Generated:** {date}
**Total Files:** {count}

---

## Documentation

- path/to/file1.md
- path/to/file2.md

## Schemas

- path/to/schema.json

## Templates

- path/to/template.md

## Reference Sheets

- path/to/reference.md

## Guides

- path/to/guide.md

## Standards

- path/to/standard.md

## Other

- path/to/other.txt

---

**Note:** All paths are relative to project root.

quality_standards.completeness: Agent finds ALL matching files in project directory using glob patterns
quality_standards.accuracy: File paths are correct and relative to project root
quality_standards.format: Simple markdown list organized by category, NO descriptions or explanations
